code:
# @param {Integer[][]} grid
# @return {Integer[]}
def find_missing_and_repeated_values(grid)
    n = grid.length
    count = Hash.new(0)

    # Count the frequency of each number in the grid
    grid.each do |row|
        row.each do |num|
            count[num] += 1
        end
    end

    missing = 0
    repeating = 0

    # Iterate through the expected range to find the missing and repeating numbers
    (1..(n*n)).each do |i|
        if count[i] == 2
            repeating = i
        elsif count[i] == 0
            missing = i
        end
    end

    [repeating, missing]
end
